description: Pruning of trees in Conservation Area.1 lime tree 37 Canonbury Park North  1 sycamore 39 Canonbury Park North Works: Lime Tree: Stem clean to give about 20' of clear stem.Remove branches over roof of 37 Canonbury Park North.Reduce height by up to 30%.Thin by up to 30%. 1 Sycamore Tree:Lift over footway.Clear up to about 4-5 lowest branches towards 37 Canonbury Park North and leave clear of roof and garden area.Reduce height by 30%.Crown thin by up to 30% mostly towards 37 Canonbury Park North.
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
